name: Create Unlimited Pages Through The CSV File
author: WP Experts Team

sections.description:
Create Unlimited Pages Through The CSV File

WP Importer plugin provide an option to create unlimited posts/pages through the CSV file. Also plugin does provide an option to create any custom post type pages in bluk.

CSV (Comma Separated Values) is a file format for data storage which looks like a text file. The information is organized with one record on each line and each field is separated by comma.

Using csv file, user can easily manage pages without do any manual task from admin. On a click “Import Now” button, your post will be create automatically, It will save your valuable time and money as well ðŸ™‚

GET FLAT 15% DISCOUNT ON ADD-ON. No Coupon Code Required. Hurry! Limited Time Offer!

Note : please don’t forget to leave your valuable feedback and suggestions for make my plugin much more better compare to other plugins.

Send your query to [Author] (mailto:raghunath.0087@gmail.com)

Click here to downlaod addon-on

Video Tutorial :

Features

  • An option to define post order
  • An option to define post status (public,private,draft)
  • An option to define post author(Author ID)
  • Create new post using CSV file
  • Create new page using CSV file
  • Create new custom post type pages using CSV file
  • Update exists post using CSV file
  • Update exists page using CSV file
  • Update exists custom post type pages using CSV file
  • Add/Update Yoast SEO plugin meta title, meta description and meta keywords

`Go Pro`

We have also released an addon which not only demonstrates the flexibility of free version, but also adds some important features:

FLAT 15% DISCOUNT ON ADD-ON. No Coupon Code Required. Hurry! Limited Time Offer!

  • Create unlimited dynamic pages
  • Update dynamically created pages
  • Create/Update dynamic custom post type pages
  • Dynamically upload post Featured image
  • Define category name for each post
  • Update unlimited custom meta fields value
  • Define custom taxonomy name for each post
  • Define the post menu order
  • Define post author
  • Define post status
  • Define custom post slug name
  • Faster support

Download Add-on Now

NOTE:

Updation will be allow only for existing pages who have created by this plugin .
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin:

  1. Unzip the plugin’s directory into wp-content/plugins.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The plugin will be available under Tools -> WP Importer on
    WordPress administration page.
sections.faq:
Can I create dynamic pages using this plugin file?

Yes, You can create dynamic pages by CSV file.

Are there any limitation to create number of dynamic pages?

No, There are not any limitation to create number of pages.

Can I update content of exiting posts by CSV file?

  • Yes, You can update content by CSV file but these existing pages should be created by this plugin.

Can I define post author in CSV file?

  • Yes,You can define post author by author id. you will need to add author id under author column

Can I define post order in CSV file?

  • Yes, you can define post order in CSV file for each post

Can I assign post category in CSV file?

  • No, This option is available only in pro addon. [Upgrade to pro version] (http://www.wp-experts.in/products/wordpress-csv-importer-pro)

Can I set post featured image by CSV file?

  • No, This option is available only in pro addon. [Upgrade to pro version] (http://www.wp-experts.in/products/wordpress-csv-importer-pro)
